DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of our study is to evaluate the effect of tramadol as an adjunct to ropivacaine local anesthetic solution in interscalene brachial plexus block for shoulder surgery.
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of Tramadol on Interscalene Brachial Plexus Block
DOC.criteria: Shoulder surgery patients on opioids diabetes mellitus interscalene block contraindicated patient refusing regional anesthesia techniques
